sn11.22:1.3: “bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, annataro yakkho dubbanno okotimako sakkassa devanamindassa asane nisinno ahosi.
sn11.22:1.4: Tatra sudam, bhikkhave, deva tavatimsa ujjhayanti khiyyanti vipacenti:
sn11.22:1.6: Ayam yakkho dubbanno okotimako sakkassa devanamindassa asane nisinno’ti.
sn11.22:1.7: Yatha yatha kho, bhikkhave, deva tavatimsa ujjhayanti khiyyanti vipacenti tatha tatha so yakkho abhirupataro ceva hoti dassaniyataro ca pasadikataro ca.
sn11.22:2.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, deva tavatimsa yena sakko devanamindo tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva sakkam devanamindam etadavocum:
sn11.22:2.2: ‘idha te, marisa, annataro yakkho dubbanno okotimako sakkassa devanamindassa asane nisinno.
sn11.22:2.3: Tatra sudam, marisa, deva tavatimsa ujjhayanti khiyyanti vipacenti:
sn11.22:2.5: Ayam yakkho dubbanno okotimako sakkassa devanamindassa asane nisinno”ti.
sn11.22:2.6: Yatha yatha kho, marisa, deva ujjhayanti khiyyanti vipacenti tatha tatha so yakkho abhirupataro ceva hoti dassaniyataro ca pasadikataro cati.
sn11.22:2.7: So hi nuna, marisa, kodhabhakkho yakkho bhavissati’ti.
sn11.22:3.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo yena so kodhabhakkho yakkho tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamsam uttarasangam karitva dakkhinajanumandalam pathaviyam nihantva yena so kodhabhakkho yakkho tenanjalim panametva tikkhattum namam saveti:
sn11.22:3.3: Yatha yatha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo namam savesi tatha tatha so yakkho dubbannataro ceva ahosi okotimakataro ca.
sn11.22:3.4: Dubbannataro ceva hutva okotimakataro ca tatthevantaradhayiti.
sn11.22:3.5: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo sake asane nisiditva deve tavatimse anunayamano tayam velayam ima gathayo abhasi:
